mapper.select: SELECT sres.pk_id,sres.resource_code,sres.resource_url,sres.resource_name,sres.resource_type FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.pk_id = sur.user_id JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.pk_id JOIN sys_role_permission srp ON sr.pk_id = srp.role_id JOIN sys_permission sp ON srp.permission_id = sp.pk_id JOIN sys_permission_resource spr ON sp.pk_id = spr.permission_id JOIN sys_resource sres ON spr.resource_id = sres.pk_id WHERE su.user_name = #{username} AND su.del_flag = 0 AND sr.del_flag = 0 AND sp.del_flag = 0 AND sres.del_flag = 0
